alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued August 07 at 8:04PM MST until August 07 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 900 PM MST. * At 803 PM MST, blowing dust with visibilities below 1 mile was observed in the advisory area. Pull aside stay alive. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 107 and 129. US Highway 60 between mile markers 129 and 146. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 152 and 154. Locations impacted include... Glendale, Surprise, Goodyear, Buckeye, El Mirage, Youngtown, Sun City West, Waddell, Wittmann, Sun City, Litchfield Park, Perryville, White Tank Mountain Park, Luke AFB and Beardsley. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
